All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Capabilities  
    FileProcessor  
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on scriptingbundle-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn scriptingbundle:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    MetadataMojo
    The metadata goal will generate two Maven project properties, namely org.apache.sling.scriptingbundle.maven.plugin.Require-Capability and org.apache.sling.scriptingbundle.maven.plugin.Provide-Capability which can be used to generate the corresponding OSGi bundle headers for bundles providing scripts executable by a ScriptEngine.
    PathOnlyScriptAnalyser  
    ProvidedResourceTypeCapability  
    ProvidedResourceTypeCapability.Builder  
    ProvidedScriptCapability  
    ProvidedScriptCapability.Builder  
    RequiredResourceTypeCapability  
    RequiredResourceTypeCapability.Builder  
    ResourceTypeFolderPredicate
